summary: The implementation successfully addresses all four requirements. REQ-1 (154-room limit) is implemented in backend with error handling. REQ-2 (bump-based sorting) adds lastActivity field and updates it on message post. REQ-3 (frontend ordering) preserves backend sort order. REQ-4 (error display) shows room limit errors in the dialog. A migration module properly initializes lastActivity for existing rooms. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.
